item.title: Income Tax Loophole to End?
item.description: From time to time, new Orders in Thailand can unexpectedly cause panic, hysteria, and mass confusion among long-term foreign residents and even Thais themselves. This year, there is a hotly discussed debate over the Order No. Por. 161/2023 issued by the Revenue Department, dated 15th September 2023, and coming into effect on the 1st of January 2024. The Order serves as new internal guidance for tax officers in interpreting Section 41, Paragraph 2 of the Thai Tax Code.
